```{r}
x = FTDT(50,50,50)

```
  
```{r}
library(misc3d)
v <-x[[1]][400][[1]]
contour3d(v, 1,alpha = 0.1)
```
  
```{r}
x <- seq(-2,2,len=50)
g <- expand.grid(x = x, y = x, z = x)
v <- array(g$x^4 + g$y^4 + g$z^4, rep(length(x),3))
con <- computeContour3d(v, max(v), 1)
drawScene(makeTriangles(con))
```
